author: Reuters Editorial
title: Iraqi PM Abadi says election fraud allegations to be investigated
text:
May 24, 2018 / 4:51 PM / Updated 36 minutes ago Iraqi PM Abadi says election fraud allegations to be investigated Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
BAGHDAD (Reuters) - Iraqi Prime Minister Haider al-Abadi said on Thursday a committee will investigate allegations of fraud in the May 12 national elections, according to a statement from his office. FILE PHOTO: Iraqi Prime Minister Haider al-Abadi speaks during the Tokyo Conference on Supporting Job Creation and Vocational Training to Facilitate Weapons Reduction for Iraqi Society in Tokyo, Japan, April 5, 2018. REUTERS/Toru Hanai
The committee will be led by the head of the financial control bureau, the statement said. Reporting by Raya Jalabi; editing by John Stonestreet
